title: Drawing, 1969-165-387, 1961
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on white wove paper
signed: In graphite lower right : A.H. Girard . Feb. 14, 1961
inscribed: In graphite across lower edge: "diamonds" . four times actual size; Verso: in graphite upper left corner  IV - 11
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Pattern of twenty five black diamond shaped with white centers arranged in alternating rows of four and three
